basics.summary: A mathematician-turned-software-developer, I am passionate about finding clear, elegant solutions to complex problems. I look to improve not only my ability to solve engineering problems, but also to communicate them and make them accessible to the people that need them. In my spare time, I also enjoy competing and teaching in the sport Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu and working on open source.
basics.name: William Acton
basics.label: Front End Developer

work.summary: Cambia Health Solutions is a nonprofit health insurance corporation based in Portland, Oregon. As a Front End Developer, I was in charge of developing member-facing website features, specifically focusing on dynamic single page applications interacting with RESTful APIs. Development technologies included jQuery, QUnit, React, Grunt and Sass.
highlights: Planned, implemented and trained peers on new standards and tooling for unit testing
Development of single page applications interacting with RESTful APIs for our member base using modern front-end technology
Took leadership over planning / research of new tools, frameworks and design architectures for future development projects
Mentored student / junior developers in front-end development best practices.

work.summary: At Linktech Worldwide, I was in charge of customizing WordPress sites to client specs. Heavy use of HTML and CSS3, alongside JavaScript and PHP.

references.name: Erlich Bachman
references.reference: It is my pleasure to recommend Richard, his performance working as a consultant for Main St. Company proved that he will be a valuable addition to any company.
